statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 16 \\ -4 \\ 12 \\ 24 \\ 12 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -20 \\ 6 \\ -22 \\ -24 \\ -14 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
